titleStmt.title: A sermon at the solemnizing of the happie inauguration of our most gracious and religious soueraigne King Iames wherein is manifestly proued, that the soueraignty of kings is immediatly from God, and second to no authority on earth whatsoeuer : preached at Paules Crosse, the 24. of March last 1608 / by Richard Crakanthorpe ...
titleStmt.author: Crakanthorpe, Richard, 1567-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by VV. Iaggard for Tho. Adams, dwelling in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Blew Bell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Blew Bell
